long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Play more games on the top-left menu.

Burger Restaurant Original Game is a time-management game where you can cook and serve delicious burgers to hungry customers. The game features a variety of burgers to cook, including beef burgers, chicken burgers, and veggie burgers. You can also customize your burgers with toppings like cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onions.

As you progress through the game, you'll unlock new recipes and kitchen appliances. You can also upgrade your appliances to cook food faster and more efficiently.

Burger Restaurant Original Game is a challenging but rewarding game that will test your time management skills. If you're a fan of cooking games, then you'll definitely enjoy Burger Restaurant Original Game.

Here are some of the features of the Burger Restaurant Original Game extension game:

Free to play
A variety of burgers to cook
Dozens of toppings to choose from
Hundreds of kitchen appliances to unlock and upgrade
Beautiful graphics and sound effects
Addictive gameplay
